CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Enterprises relative to Lumina Solutions?
SRP.A: Zenith Enterprises is {above} Lumina Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cost per hire?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Skyward Systems}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cost per hire?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Meridian Dynamics}.

VE.Q: What is AstraCorp's Cost per Hire in 1974?
VE.A: AstraCorp's cost per hire in 1974 is {40624.58} $.

VE.Q: What is Skyward Systems's Cost per Hire in 1955?
VE.A: Skyward Systems's cost per hire in 1955 is {6633.95} $.

VE.Q: What is Ironclad Industries's Cost per Hire in 1961?
VE.A: Ironclad Industries's cost per hire in 1961 is {2316.19} $.

VE.Q: What are the cost per hire of AstraCorp, Meridian Dynamics, and Zenith Enterprises in 1961?
VE.A: AstraCorp's cost per hire is {11767.64} $, Meridian Dynamics's cost per hire is {2130.98} $, Zenith Enterprises's cost per hire is {1958.34} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Cost per Hire in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum cost per hire is {50.00} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Cost per Hire in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum cost per hire is {65573.04} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Cost per Hire level recorded for AstraCorp?
What is the lowest Cost per Hire level recorded for AstraCorp?
EVJ.A: AstraCorp's lowest recorded level is approximately {4961.82} $ in {1952}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Cost per Hire?
SC.A: The average total cost per hire is {54400.78} $.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Cost per Hire go below 31446.67 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cost per Hire exceed 61534.19 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cost per Hire fall between 44165.91 and 48814.95 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1956 and 1960, was the average total Cost per Hire higher or lower than between 1954 and 1978?
NC.A: The average total cost per hire between 1956 and 1960 was {lower} than between 1954 and 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1953 and 1963, was the average total Cost per Hire higher or lower than between 1961 and 1962?
NC.A: The average total cost per hire between 1953 and 1963 was {lower} than between 1961 and 1962.

NC.Q: Between 1972 and 1974, did the total Cost per Hire experience a larger or smaller change than between 1958 and 1969?
NC.A: The change in total cost per hire between 1972 and 1974 was {smaller} than between 1958 and 1969.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1975, did the total Cost per Hire experience a larger or smaller change than between 1976 and 1979?
NC.A: The change in total cost per hire between 1963 and 1975 was {larger} than between 1976 and 1979.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Skyward Systems} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Meridian Dynamics, Ironclad Industries, Lumina Solutions, Zenith Enterprises, Skyward Systems, AstraCorp}.
